offerpromotionconten.fineprinttext: * Subject to the Refer-a-Friend program ("RAF Program") rules and terms and conditions available here. Existing Grand Rapids Energy ("GRE") customers who refer one or more new customers to GRE using the RAF Program (each, a "Referrer") may earn a $25 Visa Reward Card for each new customer who: (i) enrolls on an eligible GRE price plan, (ii) provides Referrer’s Referral Code at enrollment, and (iii) begins burning gas on an eligible GRE price plan. Referrers must: have either an active or pending account with GRE when Referee begins burning gas; authenticate their GRE account and accept the RAF Program terms and conditions; and participate by using the communication methods provided (email, Facebook, and Twitter) at grandrapidsenergy.com/refer and as specified in the RAF Program terms and conditions. Allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Maximum award: $500 in Visa Reward Cards per person / calendar year for all GRE Visa Reward Card promotional offers. Offer valid for qualifying enrollments processed by GRE between 12/01/2017 and 06/30/2018. GRE service is available for eligible customers participating in the MPSC Gas Customer Choice Program through their natural gas utility company. GRE prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.841.1541, write to Grand Rapids Energy, 400 Renaissance Center, Suite 2600, Detroit, MI 48243, or visit grandrapidsenergy.com. Referrers may combine this offer with their pre-existing discounts and promotions. The Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer’s terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. © 2017 Grand Rapids Energy. All Rights Reserved.

Earn Up to $500 per Calendar Year, Every Year!

The more you share, the more you can earn!*

2. Share your Referral Code.
